https://play.picoctf.org/practice/challenge/107?category=2&page=3

Solving:
1)If we encrypt '1' we get some long list of numbers
45144755204783291896522126425843172944783199447817697166016659921202305943485326182903449380722363832289183733571269895706337301788236545998600794941685477458007164
9370442197073885822108095855116678538793497376734657018312372762065354470796973325965336880443636969275004434685561902423856528182710023986945

but if we encrypt '12' we get 2 ciphertexts
45144755204783291896522126425843172944783199447817697166016659921202305943485326182903449380722363832289183733571269895706337301788236545998600794941685477458007164
9370442197073885822108095855116678538793497376734657018312372762065354470796973325965336880443636969275004434685561902423856528182710023986945...4780321985338694689217
30651421859569096332811867372107014643570284862249251840350006701259790537950269412667439692207456870916494150693073723787107631103306660345254532196747495609050100
98839801210445646916747496651656542390230224663186230169237291899445774899131961183169215667516843608274350583184736173718
and
47803219853386946892173065142185956909633281186737210701464357028486224925184035000670125979053795026941266743969220745687091649415069307372378710763110330666034525
453219674749560905010098839801210445646916747496651656542390230224663186230169237291899445774899131961183169215667516843608274350583184736173718...45144755204783291896
52212642584317294478319944781769716601665992120230594348532618290344938072236383228918373357126989570633730178823654599860079494168547745800716493704421970738858221
08095855116678538793497376734657018312372762065354470796973325965336880443636969275004434685561902423856528182710023986945

we can see that encryption only concatenates encrypted elements and they are always the same so encryption is deterministic like in EBC mode
So we can brute force it until we get } character
